message.content:
Subject: My Resignation from [Company Name]

Dear [Boss's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. After much consideration, I have made the difficult decision to resign from my position at [Company Name]. My last day will be on [Date], which is two weeks from today.

Working at [Company Name] has been a significant part of my professional journey, and I am grateful for all the opportunities and experiences that this role has offered me. It was an honor to work alongside such talented colleagues, including you, and under your leadership.

Please let me know how best to wrap up my projects during these final weeks. In the meantime, I will do my utmost to ensure a smooth transition for my replacement and provide any necessary support until my departure.

Thank you once again for everything. It was an absolute pleasure working with you and everyone on our team. I wish [Company Name] continued success in all future endeavors.

Warm regards,

[Your Name]
[Your Position]
